txt.en: You have summoned a companion.  Your companion can be controlled with the Companion UI, which contains commands that can be used to control your companion's behaviour and use its special skills.  Companion commands can also be dragged from the Companion UI into your regular quickslot bar.

You have summoned a companion. Your companion can be controlled with the Companion UI, which contains commands that can be used to control your companion's behaviour and use its special skills. Companion commands can also be dragged from the Companion UI into your regular quickslot bar. To unsummon your companion or rename it, right-click on the pet's portrait and choose the appropriate action.
